Text: Hey, now that we're on \n the same side, you mind \n if I ask a favor?
We're on a mission to \n steal some supplies from \n the Garrison.
Could you help us out?
If you can't, let's just \n pretend we never talked.
It's just, the kids in \n Elgona are hungry and \n need those supplies...
I know stealing's \n wrong...
But I'll help. \n It's for the kids.
Great! I'll fill you in \n once we set off.
We need those supplies \n from Fort Bismalia.
What do you \n need me to do?

While the others are 
 distracting their 
 soldiers, we need you 
 to sneak in...
If you can find the \n supply crates and toss \n 'em overboard...
We'll handle the rest.
We'll fill you in \n over the radio. \n Here, take it.
Alright, let's do this.
Black Cat, \n commence operation!
Black Cat? \n Is that supposed to \n be my code name?
*Beep* *Beep* \n Centipede here. \n Come in, Black Cat.
Black Cat here. \n I've infiltrated \n the Bismalia.
Roger that. \n Begin the \n operation.
If you find a supply \n crate, just toss it \n over the edge.
Any side will work.
As long as it \n goes overboard, \n we can grab it.
Got it.
Just be careful not to \n get spotted by the \n guards.
If you go flying around \n in the air, you'll draw \n too much attention.
Okay, I'll be careful.
*Beep* *Beep* \n Centipede here. \n Come in, Black Cat.
Black Cat here. \n What's up?
We've got enough ore, \n you better make your \n escape.
Got i-
Wait, did you \n say escape!?
The Garrison \n knows I'm here!
We'll bring the boat \n around to where the \n patrols are light.
Do your best to reach us \n without being spotted.
Just stay out of the \n sky, they'll blow you \n away with those cannons.
Understood.
We did it!
Thanks to you, our \n operation was a huge \n success!
Here's your share.
It's okay, give it to \n someone in Elgona who \n needs it more.
You're alright, Kat. \n We've got a lot to learn \n from you.
In fact, you showed us \n something we've been \n missing for a long time.
What's that?
Trust.
If you need us for \n anything, you can \n count on us!
I'll remember that! \n And hey, you guys \n are alright too.
Escape from the Bismalia
Angry Centipede: \n That's the way to do it!
Angry Centipede: \n Good job!
Angry Centipede: \n We need all the ore we can get!
Supplies Retrieved
Throw the Supply \n Crates Overboard
Angry Centipede: \n They know something's wrong. They've gone on alert.
Angry Centipede: \n They're checking for intruders, so be careful.
Soldier: \n We've got an intruder, find 'em!
Shoot, they spotted me!
Soldier: \n Intruder!
I need to get back to the Bismalia.
Soldier: \n Huh? Who are you!?
Soldier: \n Wait, are we missing something?
Soldier: \n I think the supplies are moving...
Soldier: \n Wha-?
Soldier: \n What was that sound?
Soldier: \n Oh, it's just a cat.
Soldier: \n Something's wrong.
Soldier: \n An intruder!?
Soldier: \n Who's there!?
Soldier: \n We've got an intruder!
Soldier: \n Wha-!?
Soldier: \n She got me!
Doing good...
Angry Centipede: \n Crates secured! Keep it up.
Angry Centipede: \n We only need the marked crates with the ore.
Angry Centipede: \n What just fell!?
Angry Centipede: \n Focus on getting us the marked crates with ore.
Soldier: \n You can't fool me, show yourself!
Cat Imitation
Soldier: \n Something's wrong, we need reinforcements.
Soldier: \n I think we've got an intruder, raise the alert.
Alert Level
Hmm, I don't think it reached outside the base.
